headline: Live Nation (LYV) Margin Expansion Reinforces Bullish Profit Growth Narrative Despite $412.7M One-Off Loss
summary: Live Nation Entertainment (LYV) delivered another period of earnings momentum as net profit margins rose to 2.3% from 1.1% a year earlier, showing a clear improvement in profitability. The company has averaged robust earnings growth of 79.8% annually over the past five years and recorded an even stronger 107.7% jump in the latest year. With revenue expected to climb 7.6% per year (lagging the US market’s 10.5% rate), but earnings forecast to surge 41.6% versus the market’s 16%, investors are...
